casebody.data:
Wednesday, April 4, 2001

MERIT DOCKET

01-126. State ex rel. Koppert v. Ohio Dept. of Natural Resources.

In Mandamus. On relator’s motion for leave to amend petition. The motion is granted.

Upon consideration of relator’s amended petition, it is hereby ordered that the cause be, and hereby is, dismissed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
